titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning negotiations with North Korea.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning negotiations with North Korea.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that U.S. policy and any negotiations with North Korea should incorporate U.S. values, including concern for human rights and the welfare of the North Korean people.
